sentences.sContent: The only hope of redress is in a lawsuit.
sentences.sCn: 获得赔偿的唯一希望就是打官司。

synos.tran: 救济；赔偿；纠正；重新调整

phrases.pCn: 要求赔偿；寻求解决办法

remMethod.val: re(重新) + dress(穿衣； 整理) → 重新整理 → 矫正， 修正

trans.tranCn: 赔偿, 救济, 矫正
trans.tranOther: money that someone pays you because they have caused you harm or damaged your property
